Welcome to wino-fr's documentation!
===============================

Vers une documentation automatique et structurée à base de jupyter notebooks

Données :

+------------------------------+------------+----------+--------------------------------------------------------+
|             name             | directory  | language | content                                                |
+------------------------------+------------+----------+--------------------------------------------------------+
|         pmi_frwac.csv        | frenchdata |  fr  | pmi data from olga                                     |
+------------------------------+------------+----------+--------------------------------------------------------+
| pmi_frwac_alt_corrected.json | frenchdata |  fr  | question/answer pairs for new pmi calculation frTenten |
+------------------------------+------------+----------+--------------------------------------------------------+
|      Winograd_FR_V2.xml      | frenchdata |  fr  | original french winograd file                          |
+------------------------------+------------+----------+--------------------------------------------------------+
|         wino285.json         | englishdata |    eng   | 285 winograd items                                     |
+------------------------------+-------------+----------+--------------------------------------------------------+

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :glob:

   xiaoou/index
